title: Scripters in low elo
body:
My experienced of playing on low elo smurft. There are a lot of scripters and the majority of them are from china; What more is, they barely speak english -- Like, what the fk is going on with OCE, it wasnt this bad 2years ago. Now, arround every 10 games i see 1 that is for sure scripting and 1 that dodge everything and rarely get hit "Seem to turn his script off after he gain huge advantage".

Any 1 else notice scripters, or am i paranoid?

replies.body:
Probably boosters
They pretend to feed few kills so they dont look like getting accounts boosted?
Scripting is not the same as good players. Am talking about very small side step dodge, on point every times. Hitting skills shot and land it right in the middle of movement.
i had a dude run up to me kill me then run off and dodge like 6 shrooms, (i was tmo) my jaw dropped and i wondered ...
**Sadly** there's no script for evading {{champion:17}} mushrooms or seeing them, so you just got bamboozled friend :(

You are gold with a 60% winrate. Why are you on bronze?
how did you get an account into bronze?


why are you playing in that elo?

Why cant 'I' play in that elo?

How did i get the bronze account? that is a secret. *wink
You know whats worse then scripters, people that dump elo to get to bronze, and screw people like me who only have limited time to play and get leavers/afkers/and throwers in games especially promos.

You can report people who you believe are scripting after the game by clicking the red ! post-game and report for cheating. You can also file a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) with screenshots of chat they may use, summoner names, or if you manage to find their stream with them scripting. I am unaware if there is an increasing scripting problem, but that's how you can report them.
